pullrequest.title: Fix faulty Bounding Box in Bullet and Dart when collision elements with relative transforms present

content.raw:
I forgot to mention, the style is to start function parameters with underscores (e.g. const Float _val) and group pointer and reference indicators with the variable (e.g. ignition::math::Vector3d &_v as opposed to ignition::math::Vector3d& _v).
http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=contrib_code&cat=development#Style
